channel.title: Technical Founder Community
channel.description: Recent content on Technical Founder Community

item.title: Nashville, Tennessee
item.description: Who runs TFC in Nashville? Brian Dailey It all started with this LinkedIn post and many discussions with local engineers. I want to see more engineers who are considering starting a company take the plunge. I wrote more about my thoughts on this here. Why Nashville? Nashville is a very collaborative community and a lot of smart engineers. The Nashville Entrepreneur Center have a corner on the MBA/suits, but the overlap between “startup biz-types” and “engineers” is pretty small.
